title: GNOMON - Carlos Huante - Creature design Vol 1 & 2
description:
In first video Carlos draws this creepy creature from scratch and prepares it for painting. In second video he paints it (ofcourse). 

There is a smaaal, tiny problem in second video. It starts with a monster already having base paint (i don't know how many minutes are missing from the begining of the video), but still there is a full hour of color painting and shading the creature. In case someone has the full second vol. please post it. I'd like to have it :) 

Oh, and there is also a book with this guys creature creations; an artbook that is... (My english = crap) Enjoy.
